channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytip by garages, 15th October
item.description:
Someone has fly tipped a TV, car bumper and some office furniture next to the garages.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Place Farm Avenue, Poverest, London

item.category: Light in park or open space

item.title: Lorry blocking the road the second day for hours, 15th October
item.description:
Scaffolding lorry is blocking the road for the second day without permit, no man at work sign, no road closed sign , no diversion, they have no traffic management at all. If you drive in the street, the only way to get out is to reverse in Fernhead Road(very busy road)

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 16, Denholme Road, Kensal Town, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish bags and clearance waste, 15th October
item.description:
I think this is being left by the builders working on the old folks home, but someone left a huge pile of rubbish and scrap on the corner and it's spilling out into the street now. This is a repeat problem spot, so you really need to put up some cameras to catch them!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Pleasant Place, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cat litter constantly dumped on footpath, 15th October
item.description:
Cat litter bags constantly dumped on public footpath. Current situation is that the footpath is covered in cat poo and cat litter. Previous report was cancelled , this is public land. Please clear up and investigate this ongoing issue

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Boscombe Close, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Northfield Avenue, Poverest, London

item.title: Roadwork signage left on cycle path, 15th October
item.description:
Not for the first time in Orpington area where roadwork signage materials get abandoned or chucked in bushes by roadside please can we make sure that roadwork contractors take all signage and equipment away with them when they have completed the job this signage has been abandoned in the cycle lane and is a hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Personal Health Hazard, 15th October
item.description:
These bins are placed directly under my windows such that the stench from the bin fills up the air in my room forcing me to have to go and sleep in the front room or my sonâ€™s room at times. The bins can be placed in a different spot on the Estate please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
